p: We measured the effects of the essential oil on CD4 + T cells polarization based on cytokine production by culturing monocyte-derived DCs and autologous CD4 + T cells. We isolated the CD4 + T cells by treating the PBMCs with anti-CD4 antibody conjugated with magnetic particles (Miltenyl Biotec). We cultured CD4 + T cells at a ratio of 10:1 with stimulated DCs pulsed with Alternaria or LPS for 72 hours. We measured the cytokine production in the cell-free supernatant for IL-5, IL-10, and interferon-gamma (INF-Î³; R&D systems).
